title: CH3OH decomp - sign of entropy change

content.prompt: What can be inferred about ∆S° for the reaction at 600 K?

choices.label: It must be positive, since the reaction is thermodynamically unfavorable at 600 K.
It must be negative, since there are more moles of products than reactants.
It must be positive, since ∆G° is negative and ∆H° is positive.
It must be negative, since ∆G° is positive and ∆H° is positive.

topic.text: 9.3: Gibbs Free Energy and Thermodynamic Favorability

skill.text: 6.D: Provide reasoning to justify a claim using chemical principles or laws, or using mathematical justification.
